they have support groups.  join a couple and tell them what you want to see.  i see promise in this.
So far it is pretty good. How did we become friends on here? I did not see a friends acceptance option or anything like that.  Was it by invite?
it connects through social networking.  you link twitter and facebook and it looks for friends that join up that are linked on there.  it shows me the groups you are in, etc.
About the search,  use the search option under the "Discover" link and not the Global search that is at the top right.
